Package com.lhings.library

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LhingsDevice
    This abstract class is the base class for all the Java devices.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LhingsError
    Thrown when an error in the communication with the Lhings platform is detected.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Action
    Actions represent what a device can do.
    Event
    Annotate with event the method that checks if an event should be triggered or not.
    Payload
    Informs the library about which argument of an Action must be populated with payload before invoking the method that executes the corresponding action.
    Stats
    Use Stats to annotate the methods that return statuses of your device.
